attributes.action: stop all. or any action that will, in the very recent future, make it a compulsory requirement that all people living in the UK and those subject to its constitution will have to be injected with any H1N1 Swine Flu or mutation of Swine Flu H1N1 vaccination. That people who contract H1N1 Swine flu be allowed to self medicate and self quarantine without fear of predjudice, state imposed incarceration or state quarantine, fine, or sentence of imprisonment, loss of liberty nor be subject to affliction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is my understanding through press reports regarding new bills that are passing and have recently been passed in the states, that ALL residents of america will soon be forced to take experimental, inadequately tested H1N1 swine flu vaccines. 
Those that refuse the mandatory vaccines will fall under new pandemic emergency laws that will place them in FEMA managed camps(also a bill passed to allow FEMA to take people to areas and work as require during periods of national emergency or civil unrest) where they are allowed to be held indefinitely.

Note also that the pharma companies have reduced legal responsibility during high production vaccine periods.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
